mapper.select: SELECT cfb.id, cfb.title, cfb.content, cfb.writer, cfb.inserted, cfb.updated FROM CommunityFreeBoard cfb ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT cfb.id, cfb.title, cfb.content, cfb.writer, cfb.inserted, cfb.updated FROM CommunityFreeBoard cfb WHERE cfb.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CommunityFreeBoard (title, content, writer) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE CommunityFreeBoard SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
